tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Add a new candidate named John Doe with email john.doe@example.com and phone number 555-1234 to the software engineer position using API key ABC123 and job shortcode SE2024.
Create a candidate profile for Jane Smith, email jane.smith@gmail.com, applying for the marketing manager role with API key MARKETINGKEY and job shortcode MMGR01.
Submit a candidate named Alex Johnson, email alexj@domain.com, phone 212-555-7890, for the data analyst job using API key DATAKEY and job shortcode DA2023.
Add candidate Priya Patel with email priya.patel@mail.com and LinkedIn profile linkedin.com/in/priyapatel to the HR assistant position. Use API key HRKEY and job shortcode HRASST.
Register Michael Brown, email mbrown@company.com, for the product manager opening with API key PRODKEY and job shortcode PM2024.
Create a candidate entry for Emily Chen, email emily.chen@workmail.com, phone 646-555-4321, for the UX designer job using API key UXKEY and job shortcode UXD2023.
Add candidate Carlos Rivera, email carlos.rivera@example.com, to the sales executive position with API key SALESKEY and job shortcode SALES01.
Submit a new candidate, Fatima Al-Farsi, email fatima.alfarsi@mail.com, phone 555-9876, for the customer support role using API key CSKEY and job shortcode CS2024.
Register candidate David Kim, email david.kim@domain.com, for the finance analyst job with API key FINKEY and job shortcode FA2023.
Add a candidate named Sara Lee, email sara.lee@gmail.com, phone 310-555-2468, for the graphic designer position using API key DESIGNKEY and job shortcode GD2024.
